name: ciphering-cli-tool
description: This is a command line (CLI) application. It encodes/decodes text using:  * [Caesar cipher](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Caesar_cipher).  * [Atbash cipher](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Atbash) * [ROT-8 as variation of ROT-13](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ROT13)
